channel.title: Servers without run.bat files
channel.description: I am not sure why people do this...but sometimes you download a server, and it doesn't have a run.bat file for you to double click, and get onto their server with...I have tryed adding my own run.bat file to the server (or other peoples) but it doesn't work...How do I fix this, so that I can get onto the server..? Any Help Would Be Appreciated, Thankyou - I found this problem with downloading the 'powerscape' client on the moparscape server status page =P ( plus some other clients...)

item.title: Servers without run.bat files

item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Use an IDE

Ex. Eclipse or Netbeans

item.title: Servers without run.bat files

item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

DemonsworldOwner:

Download another soruce, take that rune.bat and modidifie it for your server, if you know yours well enough to know its limlits, i hope this helped.

.> what he said… or just code yourself alot easyer =] lol

item.title: Servers without run.bat files
item.dc:creator: @mopar_fan mopar fan
item.description:
@mopar_fan wrote:

I am not sure why people do this…but sometimes you download a server, and it doesn’t have a run.bat file for you to double click, and get onto their server with…I have tryed adding my own run.bat file to the server (or other peoples) but it doesn’t work…How do I fix this, so that I can get onto the server…?
Any Help Would Be Appreciated,
Thankyou

  • I found this problem with downloading the ‘powerscape’ client on the moparscape server status page =P ( plus some other clients…)
